data.comment: Charleroi kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Mamadou Fall.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Serge Tabekou equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Mouscron kick-off.
In the minute 62, Shamar Nicholson is on a sub for Guillaume Gillet for Charleroi.
Kayembe is booked for the away team.
The away team have replaced Ali Gholizadeh with Lucas Ribeiro. This is the second substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
In the minute 78, Alessandro Ciranni for Mouscron has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
Fernando Da Cruz (Mouscron) is making a first substitution, with Robbe Quirynen replacing Darly Nlandu.
Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's second substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Beni Badibanga replacing Imad Faraj.
In the minute 87, Ken Nkuba is replacing Mamadou Fall for Charleroi at Stade Le Canonnier.
Deni Hocko (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
The home team replace Serge Tabekou with Virgiliu Postolachi.
